name: Hire me fulltime
description: Ready to embark on an exciting journey of innovation? I'm not just looking for a job, I'm seeking a canvas to paint my wildest product dreams! My passion for crafting conversation-starting products runs deep, and I'm itching to bring that energy to your team. There's a whole universe of ideas waiting to be built - let's explore it together!

name: Hire me as Freelancer
description: Got a side project that's been simmering on the back burner? Let's turn up the heat! I'm all about pouring my creative energy into exciting weekend collaborations. Picture this: your brilliant idea, my design expertise, and a dash of weekend magic. Together, we'll transform your concept from a mere thought into a tangible, awe-inspiring reality. Let's make your weekends count!

name: Order a Product Roast
description: Feeling stuck with your product? Let's shake things up! I'm offering more than just a review - think of it as a product pep talk with a twist. I'll dive deep into your creation, dissect it with care, and serve up a hearty platter of honest, constructive feedback. It might get spicy, but I promise it's all in the name of helping your product reach its full, mouthwatering potential. Ready to add some zing to your product journey?
